name: MidiWars
description:
Midi Wars is an experimental game that can use both a controller and PC Keyboard/Midi Controller.  

With a Midi Converter (I recommend BOME ) you can attach a midi piano for a rockin' boss fight!  But have no fear if you only have a PC!  

Without a converter: 

Player One uses the Controller or WASD_Spacebar

Player Two uses: 

R thru \

F thru '

C thru .
